about_the_game:
Game Introduction

The Ring of Souls in the Divine Realm: Lament for the Betrayer

On that land torn apart by the wind of fate, a legend about love and betrayal, strength and redemption is unfolding

Stein, this ancient and mysterious continent, was once a paradise where magic and miracles coexisted harmoniously. However, a sudden energy storm tore apart the spatial barriers, blurring the boundaries between the surfaces. The whispers of the gods permeate through the cracks, tempting all living beings to pursue eternal power.

And I, Solo, am the legendary magician who rose in such an era. People spread my story: how I grew from an unknown apprentice to the most powerful mage in the Stein continent, how I solved ancient puzzles and conquered impossible obstacles. My name and strength have caught the attention of even the gods, and I am only one step away from the throne of the gods.

But fate always likes to make the cruelest jokes.

Lilith My favorite person. She illuminated my life like a star in the dark night, but chose to betray at the last moment. In order to receive the gift of divine power, she personally destroyed our common dream.

In that tragic betrayal, my physical body turned into dust, but there is no way out, and my soul ring escaped a disaster. And I, carrying this ring of love and hate, began a new journey.

Now, I have regained my strength and climbed back to the peak, in search of the fragments of truth. Those fragmented memories, as well as Lilith's true intentions I stepped into the divine realm

Game features

✦ Innovative body collection gameplay ✦ Deep character development system ✦ Diverse game content ✦ Exquisite graphics ✦ Long game time ✦ More free exploration experience ✦ Unique fusion mechanism

▶ Long gaming time

Main storyline: 30 hours+

Side quest: 10 hours+

Collecting elements: 200 hours+

Adventure leveling: 200 hours+

▶ Enrich the plot content

A grand main storyline

Funny daily plot

Touching character interaction

Unexpected plot twist

Game elements

■ Combat system

Innovative turn based combat

Attribute Conflict System

Fusion skill combo

Body collection and transformation

Transform defeated opponents into equipment or leather items

Each collectible has unique attribute bonuses

Unlock exclusive skills for corresponding characters

Transformation and possession mechanism

Perfectly replicate the target's appearance and sound

Obtain the corresponding skill set for the character

Unlock special plotlines and interactions

Unique camouflage gameplay

■ Life system

Farm planting and harvesting

【 Detailed Explanation of Featured Gameplay 】

Collect the body forms of various characters

Unlock unique combination effects

Rarity grading system

◆ Skill integration

Free combination of different skills

Skill Evolution System

◆ Multiple identity adventure

Utilize transformation ability to execute tasks

Play different roles and experience the plot

Unlock hidden plot branches

Identity fraud gameplay

Is it related to the previous work Solo?

The Soul Ring of Soro - Divine Realm chapter contains all the content of the Soul Ring of Soro and has added a storyline for the Divine Realm chapter in the future.

Remember to restart the game after completing the patch.

Love generates electricity to search for the true eyes of the evil king. You can enjoy a lot of discounts by purchasing from Love Power.

(Also convenient for listing in the national region, remember to patch, group number: group: 1083308037 (not full) 2 groups 959729548 (not full))

Not suitable for gaming community tips

■ Game difficulty warning: This game belongs to a high difficulty soul RPG and contains the following challenging content:

Randomly triggered fatal traps

Puzzle solving elements that require precise operation

Challenging Boss Battle

We do not recommend the following players to try:

Players who enjoy relaxing and casual games

Players who cannot accept repeated setbacks

Impatient players

Players with less game time

For players who lack experience in high difficulty games

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: IntelCore i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: IntelCore i7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Do you want to experience the thrill of turning beautiful girls into exclusive equipment? Do you want to transform into any favorite character? Do you want to experience an unprecedented level of possession pleasure? This is not an ordinary RPG, this is your dream list!
